title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Aberdeen, Scotland, UK
description:
As part of the Global Day of Coderetreat (http://globalday.coderetreat.org/) we are holding a Coderetreat at the University of Aberdeen, Scotland on the 14th of December 2013. 
You can sign up for the event (http://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/refresh-aberdeen-code-retreat-tickets-9091401627) on Eventbrite
